item.title: Wild erorr?
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

[color=blue][size=10pt]hey, I’m making a new training area, and when i tried to make this area unwild, it errord, i put this in the client.java:

} else if (Type == 3) { if ((coordY >= 3356) && (coordY <= 3387) && (coordX <= 2502) && (coordX >= 2534)) { return false;
i put it under

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

also there were 2 other types of wild there, they are:

if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; }
and

} else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; }
and when i put that there, i got this error:

[code]client.java:6: class, interface, or en
import java.io.IOException;public bool
^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]
[size=25pt][font=Verdana]CAN ANY ONE HELP?! PLEASE![/font][/size]
